article_title: 1 of 2 rescued from apartment fire in critical condition, others homeless
article_description: Winnipeg Fire Paramedic Service rescued two people from an apartment fire on Dalhousie Drive on Wednesday evening
article_content: One of two people rescued from a burning apartment near the University of Manitoba is in critical condition  and some of the building s residents are left without homes Shortly after 6 30 p m  on Wednesday  the Winnipeg Fire Paramedic Service was called to    688 chars
